name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Cybersecurity Engineer, I bring 8 years of expertise in managing compliance standards such as **SOC 2**, **ISO 27001**, **NIST**, **IEC 62443**, and **CRA**. My background in risk management ensures robust security architecture while adhering to frameworks like **NIS2** and **ISO 42001**. I leverage my strong analytical skills and relationship-building capabilities to foster collaboration with stakeholders and drive security initiatives. 
In addition to my cybersecurity focus, I have a solid foundation in full-stack development, utilizing technologies such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My technical skills extend to cloud services including **Azure** and **AWS**, alongside experience in building enterprise-grade applications with AI and machine learning capabilities. I have a proven track record of leading projects that integrate predictive analytics and real-time data processing while implementing CI/CD automation and microservices architecture. My goal-driven approach ensures that security remains a priority throughout all development stages.
